translation: Sutra of Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva Spoken by the Buddha

source_sentence: 爾時地藏菩薩住在南方瑠璃世界。
translation: At the time, Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva was staying in the southern Ruciferian world.

source_sentence: 以淨天眼觀地獄之中受苦眾生。
translation: With the pure divine eye, he observed the suffering of sentient beings in hell.

source_sentence: 鐵碓擣鐵磨磨鐵犁耕鐵鋸解。
translation: An iron pounder pounds, an iron mill grinds, an iron plow plows, and an iron saw decomposes.
Woks and boiling water boil up, and fierce fires rage throughout the heavens.
When they're hungry, they swallow hot iron pellets.
When they're hungry, they swallow hot iron pellets; when they're thirsty, they drink copper juice.
They suffer all kinds of pain and suffering without rest.
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva couldn't bear to see them.
He then came from the south and went to hell.

source_sentence: 與閻羅王共同一處別床而座。
translation: He and King Yama shared a separate bed and seat.
There were four kinds of reasons for that.

source_sentence: 一者恐閻羅王斷罪不憑。
translation: One, he was afraid that King Yama wouldn't end his crimes without relying on him.
Two, he was afraid that the text would be mixed up.
Three, he's not yet united with death.

source_sentence: 四者受罪了出地獄池邊。
translation: The fourth is that he'll be convicted and leave the edge of the hell-pond.

They write the Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva sūtra.
He recites the name of Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 此人定得往生西方極樂世界。
translation: That person will surely be reborn in the Western paradise world.
From one Buddha-land to another, he'll go from one Buddha-land to another.
From one heaven to another, he'll be reborn in the Western paradise.
Suppose someone makes an image of Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva and writes the Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva sūtra.
He writes the Sutra of Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva.
He recites the name of Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 此人定得往生西方極樂世界。
translation: That person will surely be reborn in the Western paradise.
On the day that person dies, the bodhisattva Kṣitigarbha personally comes to welcome him.
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva will personally come to greet him.

source_sentence: 常得與地藏菩薩共同一處。
translation: He'll always be in the same place as Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 聞佛所說皆大歡喜信受奉行。
translation: They're all overjoyed when they hear what the Buddha teaches, and they believe, accept, and approve of it.
